channel.title: How do i make a weapon hit better?[delta]474]
channel.description: can some guide me throught this? :confused: i need to make like dark bow hit higher and dds hit higher? and is there a way to make it hit higher more often?

item.title: How do i make a weapon hit better?[delta]474]
item.dc:creator: @Seerofdeath Seerofdeath
item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

I havent quite figured out making bows hit higher yet, but the dds should be ez. Melee based weapons max hit is based on 2 basic things, str lvl and str bonus(on private servers). To change the str bonus on a melee weapon, go into Item.cfg. Look for the weapon or item u want to edit. (also can edit other bonuses and prices) You will see a code like this:

item = 5698	Dragon_dagger(s)	A_powerful_dagger.	40000	40000	40000	40	60	-4	1	0	0	0	0	1	0	40	0

I figured i might as well put dds since u wanted it.

The second to last number is the str bonus (40) you can change it to w/e you want it to be.

The second number is the regular shop price. i havent found out the others yet.

soz i cant help with the range hitting, but i found a guide in my source files made by aintaro (creator of dragon-history.

[code]/*

Creator: Aintaro
Date: 16/03/09

*/

hello, i will learn u how to make bows hit harder !

First open client.java and search for this :

public int maxRangeHit()

Now scroll down a lil bit and u should see this :

    if(hasCrystalBow())
    {
        d *= 1.5D;
    } else
    if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 883))
    {
        d *= 1.042D;
    } else

Now like for an example we wantto change the rune crossbow hit to make it hit harder
So scroll down till u see this :

    if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837))

Because 837 is the item id fo rune crossbow

Now to change the hit u will have just to change this :

d *= 2.9D;

To make it hit higher make it like :

d*= 3.0D

U can change the number, dont make it to high or u will hit 100+ with
crossbow

Thanks for reading this tutorial, i hope i helped u.[/code]

Soz for being a lazy noob and not typing it in my own words, dont thank me for the range stuff, thank Aintaroâ€¦lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a weapon hit better?[delta]474]
